searchvue-close: Title for the svg used to close the Quick View on mobile view
searchvue-next: Title of the svg used to move to the next result
searchvue-previous:
Title of the svg used to move to the previous result
{{identical|Previous}}
searchvue-label: Used in [[Special:Preferences]], tab "Search". Offer the user the ability to enable or disable the search preview feature.
searchvue-snippet-gotofullpage: Button shown at the bottom of the result snippet to navigate to the full page
searchvue-snippet-gotofullpage-ns0: Button shown at the bottom of the result snippet to navigate to the full article if it belongs to the Main namespace
searchvue-description-mobile:
Description paragraph for the search preview.
* $1 - Page title
* $2 - Page description
searchvue-commons-viewmore: Link to see more results for commons images for the selected page
searchvue-commons-viewmore-mobile: Link to see more results for commons images for the selected page for mobile
searchvue-commons-footnote: Credits message to inform the user that the content displayed comes from Commons
searchvue-commons-heading: Heading of the Commons images shown for the selected page
searchvue-commons-heading-mobile: Heading of the Commons images shown for the selected page displayed on mobile
searchvue-article-sections-heading: Text that represent page sections heading
searchvue-article-sections-heading-ns0: Text that represent article sections heading if it belongs to the Main namespace
searchvue-more-sections:
Text indicating the remaining amount of sections. Parameters:
* $1 - The number of remaining sections
searchvue-help: Help text for user preference that offer the user the ability to enable or disable the search preview feature.
tutorial-popup-text1: First paragraph in the tutorial popup
tutorial-popup-text2: Second paragraph in the tutorial popup
tutorial-popup-text-mobile: Tutorial popup text for mobile devices
tutorial-popup-close:
Title for the svg used to close tutorial popup
{{identical|Close}}
